sentences.sContent: This gave Bill an opportunity to hobnob with the company's president, board chairman, and leading executives.
sentences.sCn: 这给了比尔一个与该公司总裁、董事长及主管经理厮混的机会。

synos.tran: 交谈；共饮；过从甚密；亲切交谈

trans.tranCn: 对酌, 共饮, (亲切)交谈
trans.tranOther: to spend time talking to people who are in a higher social position than you
